posts.post_content:
Can't remember who the person was looking for Kaiser Wilhelms, one of his great grand daughters I think anyway if you are still interested and have $9750 I just saw this on ebay.  

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/T206-Drum-Kaiser-Wilhem-PSA-2-/161949217245?hash=item25b4ecf1dd:g:WH0AAOSwqrtWmoRz[/url]

Good luck.

You have 4mins-  lol.  

Just saw the post.  The card is mine- I didn't see the thread looking for his cards.  But based on the price you can see I'm not anxious to sell it.  I just threw it up there to see if someone really, really, really badly wanted a great drum.

I don't plan to relist it.

It's Kaiser Wilhelm's birthday today, 139 years old. Noticed his age changed sometime recently. I wrote an article about him in 2012 when his birth year was 1874. Now it's 1877, so I had to update the article.
